Name: worker_one_team
Description: Each worker belongs to at most one team

Name: team_capacity_by_size
Description: Workers assigned to a team do not exceed its team_size

Name: us_has_at_least_one_task
Description: Each user story decomposes into at least one task

Name: us_at_most_one_sbl
Description: Each user story is assigned to at most one sprint backlog

Name: sbl_exactly_one_sprint
Description: Each sprint backlog belongs to exactly one sprint

Name: sprint_exactly_one_goal
Description: Each sprint pursues exactly one sprint goal

Name: backlog_has_one_product_owner
Description: Each product backlog is managed by exactly one product owner

Name: sm_supports_at_most_one_team
Description: Each Scrum Master supports at most one team

Name: team_at_most_one_project
Description: Each team is assigned to at most one project

Name: task_at_most_one_blocker
Description: Each task is blocked by at most one blocker

Name: feature_exactly_one_backlog
Description: Each feature resides in exactly one product backlog

Name: epic_has_at_least_one_user_story
Description: Each epic contains at least one user story

Name: backlog_feature_entries_limit
Description: Features in each product backlog do not exceed its number_of_entries

Name: role_assignment_requires_skill
Description: If a worker takes a role then they must possess at least one skill
